entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
